items.name: Black Lodge Burger
items.description: dark smoky burger with chargrilled patty and smothered in cheddar. Yes, 'smothered'.

items.name: Fire Walk with Me Spicy Chilli
items.description: the slow burn of this  spicy chilli will linger with you like the mysteries of Twin Peaks.

items.name: Sheriff Truman's Classic Glazed Donut
items.description: The perfect partner to a cup of hot black joe.

items.name: Hot Black Joe
items.description: Black as midnight on a moonless night.

items.name: Blue Rose Earl Grey
items.description: Elegant, mysterious, and a perfect companion for contemplating life... and death.

items.name: Bookhouse Bourbon
items.description: served on the rocks. Strong and reliable - just like the bookhouse boys.
